summary: This mod adds a custom textured mudcrab companion named Sir Crabalot in Riverwood on a rock near the blacksmith.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a custom textured mudcrab companion named Sir Crabalot in Riverwood on a rock near the blacksmith.

Sir Crabalot is the mascot for the mod WATER, found here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268//?]WATER - Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux[/url]

I am not the author of WATER, so please check out that mod too, it is great. :D

If you enjoy this mod, please endorse!

My other mods: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4831711/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Mods[/url]

Please check out my other mods, and enjoy the nexus.
author: billmineface
